roleset.name: stand unsteadily
roleset.note: TOTTER-V NOTES: Member of VNcls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3, body_internal_motion-49, run-51.3.2. (from totter.01-v)

example.name: ARG1
example.text: Under what weights will the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation totter ?

roleset.name: move unsteadily
roleset.note: TOTTER_AROUND-V NOTES: Corresponds to same Vncls as totter.01. (from totter.02-v)

example.name: WSJ waxes eloquent
example.text: Inexplicably costumed as a rabbinical student, *trace*-1 tottering around on lifts, [Mr. Shicoff]-1 hardly seemed the fellow to catch a fancy cocotte's eye.
